about_bodydesc:
An unofficial application, for the game Artifact Card Game Dota 2.
On the web (In Coming) and for the desktop, is an assistant with the purpose of providing the latest news, changeslogs, decks/cards and more.
about_version: This version of app is: 0.1.0 (beta first release)
about_medesc: Hi, I'm a programmer on practices and a student by nature. My first language is Spanish and I am trying to learn English. I am a passionate about tech, math, games and programming. If you want contact me, you can send a message on my mail, contact on GitHub Or LinkedIn:
